text: United Left ( , IU) is a political coalition that was created in 1986, bringing together several left-wing political organizations. IU was founded as an electoral coalition of seven parties, but the Communist Party of Spain (PCE) is the only remaining member of the IU at the national level. It is currently part of Unidas Podemos. ==References== Category:1980s establishments in Spain Category:1986 establishments in Europe Category:Political parties in Spain
title: United Left (Spain)
